pages.text: Totally balanced bees for Mystical Agriculture and addons.

pages.title: ProsperiBee
pages.text: This bee cannot be bred. Spawn egg is crafted from a $(l:bees/mod/bees/mystical_agriculture#inferium)Inferium Bee(/l) spawn egg using an infusion altar.

pages.title: Soulium Bee
pages.text: Converted from a $(l:bees/wild/ghostly)Ghostly Bee$(/l) using a soulium dagger.

pages.title: Inferium Bee
pages.text: This bee cannot be bred. Spawn egg is crafted from a $(l:bees/mod/bees/mystical_agriculture#prosperity)ProsperiBee(/l) spawn egg using an infusion altar.
